title: What are two problems with virtue ethics? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are virtues and what are vices? The lists would vary and even might be relativistic. Is somebody being stubborn or resilient? Would that depend on whether his actions benefit me, or agree with what I believe to be correct? Another problem might be, What happens when there are morally conflicting actions, that include both virtues and vices? How can I choose what to do?
